content: if it seemed like there were concepts/objects other than me, then there would be how that belief feels. if you believe someone took something that was yours, then there's an emotional response because of your apparent relationship with that concept/idea/thought. i basically don't think i am what any of the concepts are describing and just use them for creating/communicating. "mine" and "yours" are two sides of the same coin (both rely on eachother) and it is clearly seen that concepts aren't ever actually separate, so it doesn't mean anything extra to me. you could say it's like drawing lines or boundaries in the sand, it's all the same stuff appearing/creating/communicating as if something else
